snippet: “The International Exhibition of Sherlock Holmes” offers a re-creation of 221B Baker Street, and asks visitors to figure out a killing.
abstract: Edward Rothstein reviews show The International Exhibition of Sherlock Holmes at Center of Science and Industry in Columbus, Ohio.
lead_paragraph: “The International Exhibition of Sherlock Holmes” offers a re-creation of 221B Baker Street, and asks visitors to figure out a killing.

headline.print_headline: A Murder to Solve, as Holmes Did
headline.seo: A Sherlock Holmes Exhibition Stops in Ohio
headline.main: A Murder to Solve, as Holmes Did
